titleInfo.title: Extension of the Rhizobium meliloti succinoglycan biosynthesis gene cluster: Identification of the exsA gene encoding an ABC transporter protein, and the exsB gene which probably codes for a regulator of succinoglycan biosynthesis

bibliographicCitation.ama: Becker A, Küster H, Niehaus K, Pühler A. Extension of the Rhizobium meliloti succinoglycan biosynthesis gene cluster: Identification of the exsA gene encoding an ABC transporter protein, and the exsB gene which probably codes for a regulator of succinoglycan biosynthesis. Mol Gen Genet. 1995;249(5):487-497.
